install.name: Consorzio Triveneto
install.author: Dioscouri
install.description: This plugin enables Consorzio Triveneto payments

param.name: account_id
param.label: Account ID (Production)
param.description: Your Ctriv vendor account id ( production )

param.name: account_id_demo
param.label: Account ID (Demo)
param.description: Your Ctriv vendor account id ( demo )

param.name: demo
param.label: Demo Mode
param.description: Enables demo mode. Do not enable for live sales

param.name: language
param.label: Language
param.description: Language (Leave Auto to let Joomla! Choose)

param.name: failed_order_state
param.label: Failed Order State
param.description: State to put the order in when the payment fails

param.name: payment_received_order_state
param.label: Payment Received Order State
param.description: State to put the order in when the payment goes well
